ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:20:37 [Issue ID 4000-663600] urn:comicvine:4000-663600 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:01:36. [Issue ID 1793209]
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the Pathfinder plunge into the history and mysteries below Kaer Maga—the no-holds-barred ‘City of Strangers’—Valeros plunges far deeper into the great beyond, defending his immortal soul in the courts of the dead! From Pathfinder author Crystal Frasier comes this scintillating tale of life, death, and what lingers when we’re gone.
Bonus: Starfinder backup story! Thousands of years in Pathfinder’s future, the Starfinder Society spreads adventure across the solar system!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Diego Galindo | 1 | B | Cover B | Jonathan Lau & Omi Remalante | 2 | C | Cover C | Marco Santucci & Mariacristina Federico | 3 | D | Cover D | Jen Vaughn | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Diego Galindo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jonathan Lau | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Marco Santucci | 7 | H/Auth | Blank Authentix Cover | None | 8 | I/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | Alex Sanchez (a) & Mohan (c) | 9 | J/Var | Sketch Cover | Ken Haeser | 10 |
